programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: First episode of the costume drama set in an Edwardian country house in 1912, written by Oscar-winning writer Julian Fellowes. The lives of the Crawley family and Downton Abbeys servants are changed for ever when the sinking of the Titanic leaves the estate without its heir and his son. The arrival of a new valet shocks the staff, who scheme to make his stay as short-lived as possible. Starring Maggie Smith, Hugh Bonneville and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: PC Penhale is shocked by the unexpected arrival of his ex-wife Maggie (Julie Graham), who appears to have forgotten that they separated years ago and wants to know why he left her. Eleanor goes on a date with local fisherman Paul Hale, an old friend she has not seen since school, while Martin and Louisa finally agree on a name for their baby - James Henry. With Martin Clunes, John Marquez and Caroline Catz

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Greengrass attempts to organise Aidensfields car rally - an event guaranteed not to pass without incident. Amid all the preparations, an elderly man is attacked, while Gina finds true love at last. Rural drama, starring Tricia Penrose and Bill Maynard

programme.desc: A film crew descends on Aidensfield, filling the vain villagers heads with thoughts of stardom. Rural drama, starring Bill Maynard, Jason Durr and Gareth Thomas

programme.desc: The detective investigates the death of a pensioner found stabbed on a train at the height of rush hour. The case has a huge impact on Joes home life when his daughter is named as a key witness, and he struggles to maintain a professional distance. The trail leads the team to a quiet Northumberland coastal town where clues appear to lead to one particular street - but why are the residents so reluctant to talk? Starring Brenda Blethyn, with David Leon, Sonya Cassidy, Jon Morrison and Eva Birthistle

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: The detective delves into the past of extreme sports enthusiast Gideon Frane after he plunges from a cliff in a ball of flames. A scan of the files reveals a long list of stalking complaints against an ex, and an anonymous letter to the victim spelling out Burn in Hell is linked to one of her friends. Aided by DC Shepherd and the newly appointed DC Edwards, the team tries to track down Gideons old gang to uncover a lifetime of bullying and an unexpected story of rough justice

programme.desc: Documentary following life inside one of Britains busiest AandE departments at Kings College Hospital in south London. Meanwhile, 79-year-old Doreen has broken her wrist in a fall at home, and parents Keeley and Michael are concerned by the fact their toddler Cydney hasnt urinated for two days

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Documentary following life inside one of Britains busiest AandE departments at Kings College Hospital in south London. A doctor is shocked when a young woman arrives in resus with life-threatening swelling on her brain following a random attack by a stranger, while a mother faces an agonising wait as tests are carried out on her 12-year-old son, who was hit by a car and airlifted to Kings by emergency medics. A 90-year-old former circus performer is also in AandE after collapsing at home, and news of his colourful past quickly circulates among the staff

programme.desc: Paramedics and doctors rush to a man who has fallen headfirst down a flight of stairs outside a hospital. A woman calls an ambulance for both herself and her husband. programme.desc: A campsite owner in Italy is given the runaround by a donkey. Theres a bittersweet departure in Portugal, and hosts in France sacrifice their own comfort for their guests sake

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At Château de Montvason, Emma and Paul uncover layers of Second World War history as they take on a very particular type of restoration, but disagree about imperfect plastering

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At Château de Thuries, near Toulouse, Jayne and Steve are pulled from pillar to post as they host a residential landscape painting course. Chateau shoppers Bart and Sarah continue hunting for their dream French home, visiting one place that brings Sarah to tears, though Bart is worried about the amount of work there is to do. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at stately home Anstey Hall in Cambridge, with father and son team John and Johnny de Bruyne. The fun starts with a character-revealing afternoon of goose-herding, before the participants dress to impress at a formal dinner. John recounts stories of royal connections - which fails to impress hotel managers Mark and Layla. In the morning, as they tuck in to a self-service breakfast, guest Tim decides that DIY doesnt work at Anstey Hall, but when he notes this on his feedback form, John and Johnny accuse him of game-playing

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the competition is to clothes-free Clover Spa and Hotel in Birmingham, where owner Tim Higgs hopes to convert his rivals to the joys of naturism. Judging with an extra critical eye are John and Jonny De Bruyne, who received negative feedback from Tim, and a thorough room inspection reveals a dusty porn DVD. Tim tries to encourage his nervous guests to take part in a naked spa experience, but John opts to watch television instead. When feedback is invited, Tim is delighted to discover Mark and Layla would stay again but shocked by the porn film discovery

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to the Angel Hotel in Coleford, Gloucestershire for the third day of the competition, where a treasure hunt organised by hosts Mark and Layla brings out their guests competitive sides. Meanwhile, there is confusion at breakfast and Laylas manners are criticised

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final stay is at Higher Gitcombe in Totnes, Devon, where owners Paul and Lynnie Jolly set out to spoil their guests. Everyone is overwhelmed by the added extras, but naturist Tim is put off by cushions and clutter. After a masterclass in Nordic walking, Lynnie serves up a veg smoothie, which unhealthy eaters Mark and Layla dubiously down in one. Over dinner, Tim challenges his hosts organic niche. And Layla, still smarting from his negative feedback, labels him weird, naked Tim. At breakfast, guests are wary as Tims order goes wrong and Jonny and Layla engage in an eating competition. When feedback is invited, the Jollys are affronted by accusations of special treatment and vow to put the record straight

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: On the final day of the competition, the owners of Anstey Hall, the Clover Spa and Hotel, the Angel Hotel and Higher Gitcombe meet for the last time to find out what they have been paid and settle some scores. Having aired their issues, the winners are announced

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw continue their mission to rescue classic cars for their deserving owners. Here, the boys take on a rundown Renault Alpine GTA belonging to David, a former computer technician suffering with ill-health

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw travel to Hampshire to pick up a year 2000 Ford Mondeo belonging to Karl, a widowed father of two who has been hit with three years of tragedy, leaving him unable to restore the car that once belonged to his now-deceased dad

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer search Oxfordshire for the perfect properties. Reena is looking for a geographical balance between her work in Oxford and her family in the Midlands, after house-hunting on and off for five years she enlists the help of Kirstie in the hope of bringing her search to an end. Tan and Steve live an hour apart and are looking for a place to call their own, Phil has his work cut out searching for the open-plan living space they want in the expensive area they are searching in

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In south London, Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer search for a flat for first-time buyers Adam and Nicole, and a townhouse for world-record-holding rower Kat. Adam and Nicole live with their respective parents and need help to get them living together under the same roof but their home patch has become a pricey part of town, so theyve saved for their entire adult lives to get a large enough deposit. Theyre nervous about spending all that hard-saved cash, but Kirstie manages to find them some hard-to-resist homes. In 2019 Kat was diagnosed with cancer. After going through chemotherapy and being told she was in remission she wanted a new focus, so she joined an all-female trio for an Atlantic rowing challenge. They beat the previous world record by more than seven days, and Kats next challenge is to put down roots with a townhouse in her beloved south London. Even with a budget of over a million pounds, Phil finds it tough to hit everything on her wishlist in the top spots where she wants to live but once they manage to focus her search on Greenwich, things start to fall into place. A house with potential tugs at Kats heart

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets neurologists Penny Talelli and Mark Edwards, who plan to combine their love of old and contemporary architecture as they transform a derelict Victorian gatehouse in north London. However, the pair soon find themselves struggling to balance their busy working lives alongside project managing the build

programme.title: Ancient Autopsy
programme.desc: Professor Suzannah Lipscomb deep dives into some of the greatest death mysteries of the ancient world, as she turns forensic detective and re-examines the final moments of four of ancient historys most iconic figures. Blending science, history, and compelling detective work, Suzannah is joined by world-renowned forensic pathologist, Dr Richard Shepherd, who deploys cutting-edge digital autopsy technology to reveal trauma, disease, and possible foul play. The pair begin by finding out if Egypts last queen - Cleopatra - was truly killed by a snake. To get to the bottom of it, Suzannah confronts live Egyptian cobras, observes venom extraction, and explores academic theories of political murder. And with Dr Shepherds forensic analysis and detailed examination of Roman records, they reconsider the truth behind one of ancient historys most famous deaths

programme.title: Ancient Egypt by Train with Alice Roberts
programme.desc: The evolutionary biologist takes a train journey across the worlds oldest and greatest civilisation, starting at the very end of the Ancient Egyptian empire in Alexandria, before heading south to Cairo, Luxor and Aswan. Alice goes deep underground in search of Cleopatra, discovers how the Romans and the Greeks reacted to the treasures of Ancient Egypt and, on a visit to the site of the Lighthouse of Alexandria, she learns how a slave became a sultan and built his own fairy-tale caste

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: A category one call comes through for a man bleeding from his ears. But how he got these injuries doesnt ring true for the paramedics. A woman whos recently had bowel surgery is losing blood and needs to go to hospital urgently. A patient is struggling to breathe, but didnt tell her husband as she didnt want to worry him, and now she needs an emergency response

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Eighty-year-old Rose has fluid on her lungs and is having trouble breathing. Her daughters Christine, Sandra and Debbie put on brave faces around her bedside, convincing her that everything will be all right, but in the relatives room theres high emotion as they contemplate life without their mother. Also in resus at Kings College Hospital is Kevin, a 55-year-old trucker who has sustained injuries in a road accident

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE

programme.title: Monarch of the Glen
programme.desc: Molly returns from holiday determined to put the sad demise of Hector behind her and look to the future. Meanwhile, Archie attempts to restore Glenbogle to its former glory by sinking vast amounts of money into creating a wolf park, a change that angers Golly, who does not want to see an end to the estates traditional sports. The appointment of a new housekeeper infuriates Lexie, who desperately wants to retain her role, prompting her to challenge the newcomer to a cookery competition. Susan Hampshire stars

programme.title: Equator from the Air
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan explores equatorial regions in the Pacific, visiting some of the worlds richest marine habitats. In the Galapagos Islands, Gordon discovers how drones are helping to protect wildlife including baby hammerhead sharks and iconic giant tortoises, while a mysterious tropical lake provides clues to the future of coral reefs

programme.title: Wild Brazil
programme.desc: The animal families face the formidable monsoon rains and the giant otter cubs must watch out for predatory jaguars and learn to swim before their river floods. The coatis have to eat as much as they can ahead of their habitat disappearing underwater, while the youngest capuchin monkey needs to master some clever survival skills. Stephen Mangan narrates

programme.title: Earths Great Seasons
programme.desc: The arrival of autumn sees chipmunks and beavers stash their winter supplies, animals from musk oxen to beetles battling for mates and gannet chicks facing lifes first challenges

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan, Anna Dimitriadis and Vianet Djenguet embark on a six-month expedition following lions, leopards and cheetahs in Botswanas Okavango Delta. Gordon films one of the largest lion prides in Africa as they hunt to feed 28 hungry mouths, while Anna tracks down the regions most elusive big cat, the cheetah. Local wildlife film-maker Brad Bestelink reunites with his favourite leopardess Xudum, but a huge wildfire threatens the resident big cats, and the team

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: The series concludes with a look at the work of people striving to protect Asias endangered wildlife, and what routes conservation could take in the future. In Japan, scientists take pregnant sharks, killed accidentally in fishing nets, and rescue their unborn young in an incubating system that simulates a womb. The programme also visits a village that used to be a hotbed of poaching and is now a centre for bird tourism

programme.title: The Americas
programme.desc: Documentary showcasing the wonders, secrets and fragilities of the American continents, beginning with the creatures that live along North Americas Atlantic coast, from the wild horses of Chesapeake Bay and the young raccooon learning the challenges of urban survival in New York City to the young black bears foraging in the Appalachian forests. Up in the air, bald eagles chase ospreys for a hard-won meal, while beneath the waters sand tiger sharks act as unlikely guardians for schools of scad fish. Narrated by Tom Hanks

programme.title: Rush
programme.desc: The 1976 Formula 1 Championship season is dominated by a fierce rivalry between two contrasting drivers, as daredevil English driver James Hunt and methodical Austrian defending champion Niki Lauda put their lives on the line to outdo each other on the track. Fact-based drama, starring Chris Hemsworth and Daniel Bruhl, with Olivia Wilde and Alexandra Maria Lara

programme.title: Andrew Tate: The Man Who Groomed the World?
programme.desc: Reporter Matt Shea uncovers the truth behind kickboxer-turned-online influencer Andrew Tate and his secretive, all-male society, the War Room. Through interviews with alleged victims, internal whistleblowers and Tate himself, this four-year-long investigation uncovers that Tates cult-like organisation has been grooming scores of women into online sex work through seduction, manipulation and what it sees as psychological conditioning. The film also confronts the mysterious mastermind behind the organisation, who helped craft Tate into a global figurehead while remaining in the shadows

programme.title: The Newsreader

But one day Naomi discovers her neighbour Sam has been taken over by an alien called Glitch who wants to experience life on earth for one day. When other aliens from Sams race show up to drag her back to her boring, sterile world, she becomes swept up in an adventure. Together, the two of them spend a day together avoiding capture and having fun

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Ancient Egypt by Train with Alice Roberts
programme.desc: Alice arrives in Cairo by train and follows in the footsteps of Victorian Egyptologist Amelia Edwards. The journey takes her to the Great Pyramids, where she is allowed to climb deep inside to see the tomb and sarcophagus of the pharaoh Khufu. In Saqqara she learns how and why the pyramids came about, and even finds time for a spot of shopping in a Cairo souk

Site foreman and football fanatic Peter from Malahide risks a red card as he tests the limits of the offside rule with chatty healthcare assistant Jade from Clondalkin, and biscuit-mad broadband engineer Derek from Cavan talks about the finer points of coconut creams with student nurse Karen from Kildare

programme.title: Liar: The Fake Grooming Scandal
programme.desc: An investigation into the false allegations of rape, grooming and trafficking made by Ellie Williams in 2020 and the backlash faced by police and Asian people in Barrow-in-Furness after her arrest. When the 22-year-olds post detailing the sexual and physical assaults she claimed to have suffered at the hands of an Asian grooming gang went viral, thousands demanded action, but were shocked to hear Ellie herself had been arrested - prompting attacks on local Asian-owned businesses and demonstrations in other northern cities

programme.title: Jerk
programme.desc: Tim lands himself a role as an extra in a period biopic about a famous disabled musician. When some campaigners kick up a fuss about the star lead - James Norton - not being disabled, Tim is recast as the lead in a knee-jerk reaction to avoid media backlash. The bosses are so concerned with optics surrounding disability, they completely disregard the authenticity of the film - Tim doesnt even have the right disability and aside from that, cannot act to save his life. Chaos therefore ensues as he brings the production to its knees. Tim Renkow stars in this comedy a cerebral palsy sufferer who uses his condition to get away with saying what others are unable to

Animated adventure based on the series of childrens books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke

programme.title: Scarygirl
programme.desc: When her world is shrouded in darkness, a young girl must travel to the mysterious city of light to save her father from a lethal scientist and prevent her planets destruction. Animated fantasy adventure, featuring the voices of Anna Torv, Sam Neill and Tim Minchin

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren steals the Book of Legends to locate the Trident of Atlantis so she can reign supreme over the ocean. Animation with the voice of Yvette Nicole Brown

programme.title: Dr Seuss The Lorax
programme.desc: A boy leaves his urban home in search of a real tree, and meets the reclusive industrialist who first created the city. The hermit tells the story of a grumpy forest creature who tried to stop him destroying the trees, and inspires the youngster to undo the damage that has been done. Animated fantasy based on the childrens book, with the voices of Danny DeVito, Zac Efron and Ed Helms

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a storm wrecks their home, a speedy sloth called Laura and her eccentric family move to the big city in their rusted food truck in the hope of making their business a success. Animated adventure, with the voices of Leslie Jones and Remy Hii

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Tommy tries to return his new brother to the baby shop, helped by Angelica, Chuckie, Phil and Lil - but the friends become lost in dense woodlands en route, turning their expedition into a scary and exciting journey of discovery. Animated comedy based on the TV series, with the voices of Elizabeth Daily, Christine Cavanaugh, Kath Soucie, Whoopi Goldberg and Busta Rhymes

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Childrens animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: A gang of streetwise penguins decides to escape from New Yorks Central Park Zoo and return to a life in the wild, but when Marty the zebra and his friends follow suit, they end up stranded in Africa on a jungle island without a clue about how to fend for themselves. Animated comedy, with the voices of Ben Stiller, David Schwimmer, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and Sacha Baron Cohen

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The escaped zoo animals discover a plane and, following a swift repair job by the penguins, manage to escape the desolate shores of Madagascar. However, they crash-land on the plains of Africa and find themselves face-to-face with their wild counterparts for the first time. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer and Jada Pinkett Smith

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest, leading to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato, Julia Roberts, Rainn Wilson and Joe Manganiello

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: A hero is needed to defend a peaceful valley community from attack by a rampaging snow leopard. The unlikely candidate for the job is a lazy panda, who enlists the aid of a legendary team of animal fighters and their wise master to teach him the martial arts skills he needs to fulfil his destiny. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jack Black, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie, Ian McShane and Jackie Chan

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Years before the sentient robots became arch enemies, Optimus Prime and Megatron were friends on their home planet of Cybertron. However, their feud changes the universe forever. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Chris Hemsworth, Brian Tyree Henry, Scarlett Johansson and Keegan-Michael Key

programme.title: The Inseparables
programme.desc: A puppet and an abandoned stuffed animal toy cross paths in Central Park and pair up for an epic adventure in New York City. Animated adventure, with the voices of Monica Young and Danny Fehsenfeld

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris
programme.desc: The lucky little tots embark on a trip to a French theme park - but while the rest of the gang are intent on enjoying themselves, Chuckie is distracted by his wish for a new mum. He sets his sights on the owner of the amusement park as a prospective partner for his single dad. Animated adventure, with the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Cheryl Chase, Kath Soucie and Susan Sarandon

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a storm wrecks their home, a speedy sloth called Laura and her eccentric family move to the big city in their rusted food truck in the hope of making their business a success. Animated adventure, with the voices of Leslie Jones and Remy Hii

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmates five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald OConnor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rivals in the bookshop business fall in love over the internet, unaware they know and dislike each other in the real world. While things remain frosty in person, the pairs anonymous online relationship continues to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Greg Kinnear, Parker Posey and Dabney Coleman.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmates five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Maverick cop Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles when an investigation into a colleagues murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He enlists the help of old ally Rosewood to prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Theresa Randle and Bronson Pinchot.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two teenage friends are on the brink of going to different colleges, so decide to mark the event by going to a party where they hope to lose their virginity. However, they have promised to supply the booze for the event, a task that proves much harder than expected because they are under age. Unfortunately, when a friend steps in to help, the situation gets even worse. Comedy, starring Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse

programme.title: I Dont Understand You
programme.desc: Stranded in rural Italy, an American couple on the verge of adopting tries to reconnect during a disastrous vacation. Comedic horror, starring Nick Kroll, Andrew Rannells and Amanda Seyfried

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burtons comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two teenage friends are on the brink of going to different colleges, so decide to mark the event by going to a party where they hope to lose their virginity. However, they have promised to supply the booze for the event, a task that proves much harder than expected because they are under age. Unfortunately, when a friend steps in to help, the situation gets even worse. Comedy, starring Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack, a struggling musician, gets hit by a bus during a mysterious event. When he regains consciousness, he finds that he is the only person who can remember the Beatles, and sets out to exploit the opportunity by passing their hits off as his own compositions. Danny Boyles comedy, starring Himesh Patel and Lily James

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: More than a decade on from his appearance in documentary series The Office, a film crew is once again following the life of David Brent. He is now working as a rep for a cleaning-goods distributor, but harbours dreams of making it big in the music business. Acting on this, he takes three weeks off work and tours with a new-look version of Foregone Conclusion, the band he fronted in the 1990s. Mockumentary comedy, starring Ricky Gervais, Ben Bailey Smith and Tom Basden.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A journalist desperate to be posted to a war zone encounters a special forces agent, who claims to have been part of a top-secret project to endow soldiers with superhuman powers. As the reporter joins the supposed psychic on a journey across Iraq, he discovers the bizarre story behind the experiment. Satirical comedy, starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: An ordinary man has a vision that the end of the world is coming. A series of inexplicable natural disasters confirms that the apocalypse is indeed at hand, and he leads a band of misfits on a perilous journey across their city in search of the means to save Earth. Spoof comedy, starring Matt Lanter and Vanessa Minnillo

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The pint-sized secret agents investigate a mad scientist who has meddled with powerful forces and created a host of bizarre mutant animals. However, the villain is not the only problem they have to face, as another pair of youngsters are determined to outshine them. Family adventure sequel, starring Antonio Banderas, Steve Buscemi and Carla Gugino

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistresss evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrants rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit has the run of a farm and its vegetable patch when the owner unexpectedly dies. When a relative inherits the property, he strives to rid his land of the rabbit and his woodland friends - but his feelings for a nature-loving woman complicate the battle of wits with the animal kingdom. Family comedy based on Beatrix Potters stories, starring Domhnall Gleeson and Rose Byrne, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Orphan Lyra Belacqua lives in a parallel universe populated by magical and menacing characters. When her best friend becomes the latest in a long line of children to mysteriously vanish, she embarks on a perilous mission to uncover the dark secret behind their disappearance. Fantasy adventure based on Philip Pullmans novel Northern Lights, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Nicole Kidman, Daniel Craig and Eva Green. Featuring the voices of Ian McKellen, Kristin Scott Thomas and Kathy Bates

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: A boy goes on holiday with his grandmother to a seaside hotel hosting a convention of witches, who have come together to hear their leaders plan to turn all the children in England into mice. When the chief hag discovers the young lad eavesdropping at their meeting, she decides to make him one of her first victims. Childrens fantasy directed by Nicolas Roeg, based on the book by Roald Dahl, and starring Anjelica Huston, Mai Zetterling, Jasen Fisher, Jane Horrocks, Rowan Atkinson and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: Young agent Juni has to go it alone when his big sister Carmen is kidnapped by the evil Toymaker, forcing the plucky junior spy to infiltrate the villains virtual reality world to rescue her. Adventure sequel, starring Daryl Sabara, Alexa Vega, Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Banderas, Ricardo Montalban, George Clooney, Steve Buscemi, Salma Hayek and Elijah Wood

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britains leading spy following the assassination of all the countrys other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent retires to a Tibetan monastery in disgrace after a mission goes wrong. He is lured out of seclusion by the chance to redeem himself when his former bosses seek his help in foiling an attempt to assassinate the premier of China. Spy comedy sequel, starring Rowan Atkinson, Gillian Anderson, Rosamund Pike and Dominic West

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski

programme.title: Jackie Chans The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A bumbling chauffeur steps in to take the place of a secret agent injured in an explosion. Wearing the agents hi-tech suit, and with the help of a rookie spy, the humble driver now has all the power he needs to stop a villain from gaining global domination by polluting the worlds water supply. Comedy adventure, starring Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs and Richie Coster

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. When an evil plot emerges to sabotage the tournament, the quick-witted dog assembles the other mascots into a team to foil the villains responsible. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: In modern-day London, Oliver Twist is a talented graffiti artist who is lured into a street gang headed by Fagin. Before long, he and his hustlers plan the heist of the century. Director Martin Owens update to Charles Dickens Oliver Twist, starring Michael Caine, Lena Headey, Noel Clarke, and Sally Collett, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.desc: A childrens football team competes in a world championship, but one member is left off the field to look after the canine mascot. Family adventure, starring Matthew James Roberts and Kristin Carey, with the voice of Rob Schneider

Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: An orphaned girl befriends a benevolent giant, who takes her off to a magical land, where they attempt to stop the man-eating creatures that are invading the human world. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Roald Dahls book, starring Mark Rylance, Ruby Barnhill and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: The adventures of the boy who never grows old, as he whisks Wendy Darling and her brothers away to the magical world of Neverland - where they come face to face with fearsome Captain Hook. Adaptation of JM Barries fantasy novel, starring Jeremy Sumpter, Rachel Hurd-Wood, Jason Isaacs and Lynn Redgrave

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A 14-year-old with a reputation for tall tales loses the sole copy of a story he has written for school - only for it to end up in the hands of a Hollywood producer. When the youngster realises it has been made into a blockbuster movie, he goes to Los Angeles with his best friend to claim a fair share of the profits - but when the movie executive refuses to do the right thing, they plan a fitting revenge. Comedy, with Frankie Muniz, Paul Giamatti and Amanda Bynes

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creatures mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tigers Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. Drama, starring Sunny Pawar, Claudia Gerini and Amandeep Singh

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid archaeologist sets out to find his estranged father, who has gone missing while searching for the Holy Grail. Once reunited, the duo team up to finish the task and locate the sacred relic before the Nazis get their hands on it. Action adventure sequel directed by Steven Spielberg, the third instalment in the successful franchise. Harrison Ford stars, alongside Sean Connery, Alison Doody, River Phoenix, Julian Glover and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: The globe-trotting archaeologist teams up with a rebellious teenager who draws him into a search in the Amazon jungle for a mysterious artefact of untold power. But their quest is hindered by Soviet agents who also want the fabled object for a more sinister purpose. Action adventure sequel, starring Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf, Ray Winstone and John Hurt

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: News of a friends murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian OConner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: In AD 33 Jerusalem, non-believer Clarence hatches a scheme to pose as a messiah as he approaches the 30-day deadline imposed by sadistic loan shark Jedediah the Terrible. News spreads of Clarences powers of healing, which may spare him Jedediahs blade, but condemn him to crucifixion at the hands of a preening Pontius Pilate. Comedy, starring LaKeith Stanfield, Omar Sy, RJ Cyler, Eric Kofi-Abrefa and James McAvoy

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two sexually frustrated teenagers use their computer to design the perfect woman, but are ill prepared for the outcome when their creation comes to life. She decides to make men of them, by putting them in a series of situations that will force them to stand up for themselves. John Hughes sci-fi comedy, starring Kelly LeBrock, Anthony Michael Hall, Ilan Mitchell-Smith, Robert Downey Jr and Bill Paxton

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: A teenager plays truant from school and spends the day dragging his girlfriend and a reluctant friend into all manner of crazy adventures in the big city - while the schools dean of students vows to stop at nothing to prove the youngster is faking illness. Comedy, starring Matthew Broderick, Mia Sara, Alan Ruck, Jennifer Grey, Jeffrey Jones and Charlie Sheen

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A veteran lifeguard commands a highly trained team that keeps the sun-kissed resort of Emerald Bay safe. As he breaks in some new recruits - including an insubordinate former Olympic swimmer - he has to contend with a dangerous new drug sweeping the beach. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: News of a friends murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian OConner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varleys comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After losing his home, Lucius, the son of a slain Roman General, is forced to enter the Colosseum in an attempt to bring glory back to Rome. Ridley Scotts historical drama sequel, starring Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington, with Connie Nielsen and Derek Jacobi reprising their roles from the first film

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, Baby, a young getaway driver with tinnitus, takes part in a heist which seems doomed to fail, especially as the characters involved lose touch with reality as events spiral out of control. Writer/director Edgar Wrights Bafta-winning, music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Lily James, Jamie Foxx, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: A troubled priest and a novice nun discover a religious orders terrible secret and battle a malevolent force while investigating the apparent suicide of a Romanian nun. Fifth instalment in The Conjuring Universe horror saga, starring Taissa Farmiga and Demián Bichir

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: Helm Hammerhand sits on the throne of Rohan, flanked by sons Hama and Haleth and rebellious daughter Hera. Dunlending lord Freca proposes a marital union between Hera and his son Wulf, which Helm loudly rejects. In a subsequent brawl between fathers, Helm unintentionally lands a fatal blow, so Wulf vows revenge and amasses an army led by General Targg. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gaia Wise, Brian Cox, Luke Pasqualino and Lorraine Ashbourne

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: In 1838 Germany, Thomas Hutter is sent to the Carpathian mountains to secure the signature of enigmatic nobleman Count Orlok on a property sale in the German city of Wisborg. Thomas leaves his bride Ellen in the care of friend Friedrich Harding and his wife Anna. The young man barely survives the exhausting trip to Europe and stumbles home to find Ellen driven to delirium by a telepathic bond to the Count. Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A father returns to Australia to buy his childhood home. To celebrate, he takes his teenage son to Luna Bay so they can surf together. However, he becomes locked in a battle of one-upmanship with local thugs. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Julian McMahon

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

Director Robert Eggers version of the Dracula-inspired horror, starring Bill Skarsgard, Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption. Writer/director Jed Harts thriller, starring Lyndsey Marshal and Declan Adamson

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: An ex-soldier meets a teen fleeing a gang, an encounter which forces them to confront their pasts while navigating present realities. Director Mark OConnors thriller, starring Luke McQuillan, Aidan Gillen and Daniel Fee

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton
