Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbets drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover the latters boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo faces a race against time to avoid eviction. Comedy, starring Keke Palmer and SZA

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A chain of bizarre and deadly incidents in several countries leads scientists to the conclusion that the Earths core has stopped spinning. As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planets surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls

programme.title: The Ring 2
programme.desc: Journalist Rachel Keller and her son try to rebuild their shattered lives, moving from Seattle to Oregon and starting afresh. However, the vengeful spirit of Samara follows, and this time she is determined to destroy them. Sequel to the horror remake, starring Naomi Watts, Simon Baker and David Dorfman, and featuring a cameo appearance from Sissy Spacek

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045, gamers explore a virtual world in the quest for a deceased tycoons fortune. However, they must also contend with an evil corporation who will stop at nothing to get their hands on the prize. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Ernest Clines novel, starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn, Simon Pegg and Mark Rylance

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriends father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Exorcist John Constantine is cursed with the ability to see spirits stalking the Earth, and grudgingly takes on the forces of evil, hoping his actions will earn him a place in heaven. However, he is told he has terminal cancer and time for salvation is running out - unless a policewoman investigating her twin sisters death can find the key to saving his soul. Supernatural thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz and Tilda Swinton

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. But as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of Tinseltown, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past. The third instalment of director Ti Wests acclaimed X film series, starring Mia Goth, Lily Collins, Giancarlo Esposito and Kevin Bacon

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A teenager recovering from the suicide of a friend persuades a group of her classmates to join her in attempting to make contact with the dead girls spirit. They discover that she was driven to her death by dangerous supernatural forces, which they have unwittingly unleashed to prey on them. Horror, starring Olivia Cooke and Ana Coto

programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villains
programme.desc: This Halloween, face terror in every form: from the haunted halls of The Shining to the unseen menace of The Invisible Man, this collection delivers horror at its finest

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family experience strange events in their house and become convinced it is haunted. However, after moving on, they find the dark forces have followed them and when their son mysteriously falls into a coma, they must find a way to get rid of the paranormal entities tormenting them. Horror, starring Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: Due to the pandemic, Parker and her best friend decide to quarantine at the family lake house alone - or so they think. Horror, starring Gideon Adlon, Bethlehem Million and Dylan Spradberry

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An expedition to find King Solomons diamond mines in the jungles of the Congo disappears without trace. The tycoon behind the mission sends his assistant, a former CIA agent, to find out what became of the explorers - only to discover that the party met a grisly fate at the hands of a horde of vicious apes. Action adventure based on Michael Crichtons novel, with Dylan Walsh, Laura Linney, Tim Curry and Grant Heslov

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent DOnofrio

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Maverick film-maker Carl Denham and his cast and crew board a ship bound for a mysterious island - but when they arrive, a giant gorilla carries off their leading lady, Ann Darrow. As the crew makes its way through the teeming jungle to find her, the director concocts a dangerous scheme to capture the great ape and take it back to New York. Peter Jacksons remake of the fantasy adventure, starring Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody and Andy Serkis, in a dual role as the ships cook and motion-captured creature

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: Daniel and Lacy Barretts relatively peaceful existence is disturbed when strange things begin to happen around their suburban home. As the situation escalates, the couple become convinced they are being tormented by alien visitors, but when they get in touch with an expert in extraterrestrial activity, they realise their ordeal has only just begun. Sci-fi horror, starring Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton and Dakota Goyo.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part 2
programme.desc: A gang of foolhardy teenagers head for idyllic Crystal Lake with all manner of shenanigans in mind. But before they can get up to anything, a grotesque madman begins bumping them off in increasingly grisly fashion. Horror sequel, starring Amy Steel and John Furey and Warrington Gillette

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part III
programme.desc: Disfigured mass-murderer Jason Voorhees returns having survived a brutal attack and embarks on another blood-drenched killing spree around Crystal Lake. Horror sequel, starring Dana Kimmell, Paul Kratka, Tracie Savage, Jeffrey Rogers and Richard Brooker

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: The disappearance of an eight-year-old girl ties together a series of past deaths and disappearances, as well as bringing the truth about a broken familys history into the light. Thriller written and directed by Logan George and Celine Held, starring Dylan OBrien and Eliza Scanlen

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Grief-stricken after the loss of her child, a woman takes refuge at a lake house, only to be met with an aberration of herself from a parallel universe. Director Kourosh Aharis thriller, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Aldis Hodge and Edwin Hodge

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead mans revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancys novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. Pope Pius XVI has died suddenly and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind involving a stolen canister of anti-matter. Ron Howard takes the reins once again for the sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer, Stellan Skarsgard and Pierfrancesco Favino

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: The disappearance of an eight-year-old girl ties together a series of past deaths and disappearances, as well as bringing the truth about a broken familys history into the light. Thriller written and directed by Logan George and Celine Held, starring Dylan OBrien and Eliza Scanlen

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: In 2008, at the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel, four terrorists take the staff and residents hostage. However, some of the employees risk their lives to protect their guests. Writer/director Anthony Marass fact-based thriller, starring Dev Patel, Armie Hammer and Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Following his life-or-death missions in The Da Vinci Code, and Angels and Demons, long suffering expert Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the symbologist suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Director Ron Howards conversion of the Dan Brown thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: The nomadic vigilante tries to save an army major who has been framed for murder and treason. Jack Reacher discovers that Turner has been targeted by a secret government conspiracy, and together they go on the run to expose the truth. Director Edward Zwicks blockbusting action thriller sequel based on Lee Childs novel, starring Tom Cruise, Cobie Smulders, Danika Yarosh and Aldis Hodge

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Battle Royale
programme.desc: As teenage crime spirals out of control, the Japanese government adopt a hardline approach, sending classes of youngsters to an isolated island where they will be forced to kill or be killed in ever more horrifying ways. Thriller, starring Takeshi Kitano, Tatsuya Fujiwara, Aki Maeda and Taro Yamamoto. In Japanese

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: A youngster called Chan Lok-kwan accidentally enters the Walled City, discovers the order amidst its chaos, and learns important life lessons along the way. Chinese crime thriller with subtitles, starring Raymond Lam, Louis Koo and Sammo Hung

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A university student attempts to live his life without a fear of consequences. Co-writer/director Ethan Bergers drama, starring Alex Wolff, Lewis Pullman and Bo Mitchell

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Jack Ryan foils an assassination attempt by an IRA splinter group, killing one of the terrorists in the process. However, he becomes caught in a lethal game of cat-and-mouse with the dead mans revenge-seeking brother. Thriller based on Tom Clancys novel, starring Harrison Ford, Sean Bean, Samuel L Jackson, Richard Harris and James Earl Jones, reprising his role from earlier Clancy adaptation The Hunt for Red October

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Following his life-or-death missions in The Da Vinci Code, and Angels and Demons, long suffering expert Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the symbologist suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Director Ron Howards conversion of the Dan Brown thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: The Last Stop In Yuma County
programme.desc: While stuck at a rural Arizona rest stop, a salesman is thrust into a hostage situation by the arrival of two ruthless bank robbers. Writer/director Francis Galluppis crime thriller, starring Jim Cummings, Faizon Love and Jocelin Donahue

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: Will Spann is driving his soon-to-be ex-wife Lisa to her parents home when she mysteriously disappears without a trace during a stop at a gas station. A frantic Will engages the local police and Lisas parents in a desperate attempt to find her, but as time passes and suspicion falls on him, he must take matters into his own hands, delving into the towns criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jaimie Alexander

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowes remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A former army sniper is arrested following a random shooting that leaves five people dead, but protests his innocence. An elusive former military police investigator is called in to examine the case, and becomes convinced a conspiracy is at work. Action thriller based on Lee Childs novel One Shot, starring Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Werner Herzog and Robert Duvall

programme.title: The Last Stop In Yuma County
programme.desc: While stuck at a rural Arizona rest stop, a salesman is thrust into a hostage situation by the arrival of two ruthless bank robbers. Writer/director Francis Galluppis crime thriller, starring Jim Cummings, Faizon Love and Jocelin Donahue

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: An idealistic undercover cop in 1960s New York is ostracised by his fellow officers for his refusal to take bribes. Sickened by the widespread corruption in the force and the refusal of his superiors to do anything, he sets out to publicly expose the guilty parties, putting his own life on the line in the process. Fact-based drama directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Al Pacino and John Randolph

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan enlists the help of a few good friends for the funeral home remodel. Robin and Darlene take a big career risk

programme.title: The Conners
programme.sub-title: The Best Laid Plans, A Contrabassoon and A Sinking Feeling
programme.desc: Darlene struggles to cope with the stress of construction. Lou returns as Marks combative contrabassoon teacher

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer and Jason tell Vernon he has received $101million offer from Dallas, but their work on his behalf seems to be in vain as Reggie urges him to hold out for more. Meanwhile, a hung-over Joe hi-jacks Andersons yacht as he aims to court more star players, and Charles receives unwanted attention from a girl he met at the party. Comedy drama, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: The fallout from Spencer and Joes yacht party continues as one of the attendees blackmails Vernon, threatening to take some incriminating pictures into the public domain. Meanwhile, Ricky tries to patch things up with teammate Alonzo by taking him out to a strip club, and Charles makes a fatal error in hiding his secret relationship with stalker-fan Sammi. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, JD Washington, Rob Corddry and Omar Miller

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Charles finds himself feeling increasingly stressed, and seeks refuge at Rickys place, where he gets high and samples many extravagant recreational rooms in the football stars home. programme.title: Tina (2021)
programme.desc: Born Anna Mae Bullock in 1939, Tina Turner has sold in excess of 100 million records and earned numerous plaudits including Grammy awards and induction into the Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame with her first husband, Ike Turner. She was the first woman to grace the cover of Rolling Stone magazine and dabbled in acting including a memorable performance opposite Mel Gibson in Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome. Following a prolonged period of ill health, Turner intends to retire from the spotlight with her second husband, Erwin Bach. She bids farewell to her fans in the emotional documentary Tina. Directed by Dan Lindsay and TJ Martin, the film invites the singer to reminisce about her turbulent life and career with glowing contributions from friends, family and fans including Oprah Winfrey and Angela Bassett

programme.desc: Katie Simpsons family and friends prepare for Jonathan Cresswells murder trial, but the case takes a shocking turn in court

programme.desc: The top 10 unexplained technologies, such as mysterious golden orbs discovered in Mexico, a sacred wooden box that could communicate with the heavens and an ancient tomb that is said to depict an astronaut. Might these sensational artifacts be evidence of otherworldly contact?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: A look at the silent threat of submarines, from tests in the River Thames, to the Germans deadly U-boat attacks in the Second World War

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: The role of ships during the Cold War, featuring a look at two submarines - former enemies - now moored in a Kent river. Plus, the story of Soviet submariner Vasili Arkhipov, who refused to authorise a nuclear launch

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.sub-title: East: Stone Age Engineering and Battle of Bullecourt
programme.desc: Alice Roberts investigates the best archaeological discoveries of 2018 from the East of the UK, including an ancient lost monument as old as Stonehenge uncovered in Suffolk, a dig at the site of Britains first tank battle, and a coin hoard that offers an insight into the effect the English civil war had on the lives of ordinary people

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts follows archaeologists as they unearth Britains most spectacular iron-age grave, a chariot burial in East Yorkshire. The programme also follows two other archaeological digs, an Iron-Age hill fort found in North Wales, and the remains of six roundhouses on the bed of Loch Tay in Perthshire, Scotland

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explores the UKs past through the stories of its towns, examining key periods in history by delving into the secrets of places that encapsulate them. In the first episode, Alice tells the story of Roman Britain by studying the history of Chester. She enjoys an authentic Roman feast, heads deep underground to check out an extraordinary archaeological find, and explores a radical theory regarding the Romans plans for Chester

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: Unsolved sightings of dark, triangular flying objects that occurred around the world during the 1980s and 90s in the UK, US and Belgium

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: An investigation into the Roswell incident in 1947, when a UFO landed in the New Mexico desert. At the time, the US army claimed it had recovered a flying saucer, but this was quickly retracted and the item was declared to be a humble weather balloon. Experts examine the evidence still available to try to reach a conclusive answer as to whether the crashed object was from Earth or another planet

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: An examination of objects found on the Mary Rose and what they reveal about life on a Tudor ship. Plus, the battle-winning tactics of Admiral Nelson on HMS Victory

programme.title: Combat Ships
programme.desc: A look at the tactics employed to pass strategically important ships under the nose of the enemy, and the use of intelligence to carry out naval attacks

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts tells the story of Tudor England by studying the history of Norwich, learning the harsh reality of religious intolerance, uncovering the origins of Norwich FCs iconic canary and experiencing humiliating Tudor justice. Aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson takes to the skies to see how the current layout reflects its history and, at the conclusion of the episode, cutting edge CGI is used to recreate how Norwich would have looked during this period of British history

programme.title: Clash of Ancient Warriors
programme.desc: The Battle of Marathon, which took place in 490 BC during the first Persian invasion of Greece. programme.desc: The unexpected things revealed by catastrophic disasters, featuring a medieval shipwreck that could reshape history and a Greek version of Atlantis that sank in a tsunami.

programme.title: Discovered by Disaster

Plus, clues are unravelled to Maya political intrigue in Guatemala

programme.desc: An epic journey through the birth of the American West, examining the relentless competition for land, power, and identity that forged a nations history, spanning a century of pivotal events. This represented a struggle for sovereignty and survival for the Native American tribes during a time of great change. programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explores the Georgian era in her home city of Bristol. She takes a horse-drawn carriage ride to explore Cliftons Georgian architecture, samples some of the backstreet gin that was considered a threat to civilisation, and discovers the ingenious story behind the worlds first chocolate factory. She also delves into the citys links with the slave trade, uncovering horrific tales in the historical records. Plus, aerial archaeologist Ben Robinson provides a birds-eye view of how 18th-century wealth transformed the city

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice Roberts explores Cardiffs Edwardian past, discovering how the coal industry transformed the Rhondda Valley in the early 1900s. She investigates the difficult and often dangerous work of the miners, and visits the trading floor where the first ever million pound cheque was signed. The programme also investigates how global shipping routes and plentiful employment brought immigrants from across the world to Wales, and meets descendants of people who came to the city in the early years of the 20th century

programme.title: The Great British Dig: History in Your Back Garden
programme.desc: Hugh Dennis and the team solve a medieval mystery in Coventry, as they search for a monastic grange known as Biggin Hall, which provided produce for the nearby monks at St Marys Priory. As the team dig deeper, they not only uncover all kinds of exciting artefacts that tell them more about the lives of the monks, but completely redraw the map of what we thought we knew about the grange itself in Coventry

programme.title: Secrets in the Dark

Plus, how the 1717 wreck of Black Sam Bellamys pirate ship Whydah Gally yielded treasure, skeletons and new insights into the hidden world of piracy from its watery grave off Massachusetts

programme.title: Worlds Most Unexplained...

programme.title: Grimm

programme.title: Grimm

programme.title: Brassic

programme.title: Brassic
programme.desc: Tommo befriends once semi-famous dance arcade champion Craig as both take on a rival club owner thats been stealing Rat and Cutter customers. programme.title: Brassic
programme.desc: Cardis mum shows up in Hawley after being Awol for years and announces shes getting married, while Carol gets a nasty shock of her own with the arrival of a man with whom she had a holiday fling and then married, but never got round to divorcing

programme.title: Brassic
programme.desc: Ashley decides its time to up his game after being physically humiliated by some local youths, enlisting the help of Jim and Cardi as he embarks on a strict training regime. programme.title: David Attenboroughs Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: The naturalist and film-maker explores the many varieties of plant life housed at the Royal Botanic Gardens in Kew, west London, and explains what they reveal about the natural world and the development of life on Earth. He begins inside the establishments Palm House, whose climate has been engineered to simulate conditions found in rainforests, charting the evolution of plants that grow in the worlds wettest regions and investigating how flowering plants spread across the globe so rapidly

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: The naturalist explores how the plants at Kew Gardens change through the seasons and demonstrates the surprising properties of several species, including the predatory pond-dwelling bladderwort utricularia and a fungus that appears to be capable of mind control. He also discusses the largest single organism on the planet, visits the worlds biggest flower and explains how plants and insects can communicate using scents and music

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: The naturalist concludes his exploration of the Royal Botanic Gardens in Kew, west London, by examining plants that have evolved to minimise their dependence on water, enabling them to survive in the worlds driest environments. He witnesses a cactus blooming at midnight, tells the story of the spectacular flowering of the Agave franzosinii, and visits the Millennium Seed Bank, a facility designed to save plants from future extinction

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby
programme.desc: Bridgets focus on single life and her career is interrupted when she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch - she can only be 50 per cent sure of the identity of her babys father after a pair of one-night stands. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey, Emma Thompson and Sally Phillips

programme.title: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
programme.desc: American talk show in which British comedian, actor and writer John Oliver presents a satirical look at the biggest news stories, political developments and pop culture events of the previous seven days. The topical series sees the former Daily Show reporter offer his distinct take on a variety of social, political and existential issues facing society

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: Preparations are being made for Larry and Cheryl to renew their marriage vows on their tenth wedding anniversary, but Larrys efforts to impress the rabbi result in some heated arguments. He also considers an offer from his dry cleaner. Guest starring Gina Gershon

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
programme.desc: In an extended episode, Larry anxiously prepares to open on Broadway in a new production of hit show The Producers - but an argument with co-star David Schwimmer jeopardises the proceedings. Cheryl reminds him that time is running out to cash in his unusual anniversary present. Guest starring Mel Brooks, David Schwimmer, Anne Bancroft and Nathan Lane

programme.title: The Force: Manchester
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of Greater Manchester Police, which is Englands second-largest force and is responsible for protecting 2.7 million people

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: The Proactive Squad from Thames Valley Police use unmarked cars fitted with on-board video cameras to give an intriguing insight into how they deal with robberies, street fights and domestic violence

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: An armed hit squad lays siege to Robins Nest, with TC being badly injured and Rick fighting for his life

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: While training with Long Beach SWAT, Street discovers a biker club has stolen a cache of armour-piercing bullets and brings 20-Squad into the hunt for the gang before they can pull off a daring and deadly heist. As Hondo struggles with changes at work, Nichelle finds herself at odds with her former colleague Bruce

programme.title: Live NFL
programme.desc: Baltimore Ravens v Detroit Lions (Kick-off 1.15am). Coverage of the week three match at MandT Bank Stadium. These two sides last met back in October 2023 when the Ravens came away with an impressive 38-6 victory. The hosts scored points in every quarter while it took until the fourth quarter for the Lions to get something on the board. The visitors will be looking to improve on a record that has only seen them beat Baltimore once in their history

programme.title: EFL Cup Retro
programme.sub-title: Retro Efl Cup Final 2009: Manchester United V Tottenham
programme.desc: Manchester United v Tottenham Hotspur in the 2008/09 final. Spurs were managed by Harry Redknapp and had a strong run that led them to the final of the competition, having beaten the likes of Newcastle, Liverpool and Watford in previous rounds. The Red Devils had beaten Middlesbrough, Queens Park Rangers and Blackburn Rovers in the early rounds, before beating Derby County 4-3 on aggregate

programme.title: Ryder Cup Memories
programme.desc: Luke Donald shares his memories of the remarkable 2012 Ryder Cup in Medinah, where the European team made a staggering comeback to win on the final day. The Americans went into the final day with a 10-6 lead, needing just 4.5 points from the 12 singles matches to win, but the Europeans won eight and tied one of the 12 singles matches to claim a famous 14.5-13.5 victory

programme.title: Live Formula 1
programme.desc: The Azerbaijan Grand Prix (Start-time 12.00pm). Coverage of the 17th round of the season from the Baku City Circuit. This is just the eighth edition of this race after its inception back in 2017, with Australias Daniel Ricciardo winning the first race eight years ago. Sergio Perez is the only driver to win this Grand Prix more than once thanks to victories in 2021 and 2023, with the likes of Lewis Hamilton, Max Verstappen and Valtteri Bottas all winning here as well

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Sunderland v Aston Villa (Kick-off 2.00pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from Stadium of Light, as the two teams meet for the first time in seven years. Their last meeting back in March 2018 was in the Championship and saw Villa come away with a dominant 3-0 victory. The visitors have struggled so far this season by their standards, and only picked up one point from their first three league games before the international break

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Arsenal v Manchester City (Kick-off 4.30pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from Emirates Stadium. The hosts have had the slight upper hand in recent fixtures between these two teams, winning two and drawing three of the last five meetings. The previous fixture between the two clubs saw the hosts dismantle Pep Guardiolas side, as the Gunners picked up a 5-1 victory at this venue last season, with five different players scoring for Mikel Artetas side

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Arsenal v Manchester City (Kick-off 4.30pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from Emirates Stadium. The hosts have had the slight upper hand in recent fixtures between these two teams, winning two and drawing three of the last five meetings. The previous fixture between the two clubs saw the hosts dismantle Pep Guardiolas side, as the Gunners picked up a 5-1 victory at this venue last season, with five different players scoring for Mikel Artetas side

programme.desc: The work of officers of the Canada Border Services Agency as its staff enforce customs, quarantine, immigration and finance laws. programme.title: Send in the Dogs

programme.title: American Pickers: Best Of

programme.title: Speed with Guy Martin
programme.sub-title: Speed with Guy Martin: F1 Challenge
programme.desc: The motorcycle racer joins a pit crew during the 2017 Belgian Grand Prix, providing behind the scenes insight into the world of Formula One. Guy has to work on the split second timing that allows a team to change four tyres in 1.92 seconds, with each individual mechanic as many as 34 different actions without getting in each others way, and also takes on the most dangerous job on the crew - stepping in front of speeding vehicles to remove tyres as soon as they stop

programme.title: Top Gear: From A-Z
programme.desc: John Bishop narrates an alphabetical romp through the series most memorable stunts and features as former hosts Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May pushed vehicles of all shapes and sizes to their limits. With 22 seasons of the show, there was no shortage of material to choose from as the likes of Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz attempted to be the fastest Star in a Reasonably Priced Car, and the presenters risked life and limb in their assorted globe-trotting adventures

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Sean Kelly oversees bidders in Milton Keynes, where portable toilets are up for grabs. Scotty, Heavy D, Linda, Nat and John also fight for the biggest gains in a Dutch auction

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Sean Kelly and the bidders are looking for treasure in Somersets storage units, where a bouncy castle and an air boat are among the finds

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Heavy D is in town and is prepared to risk having his fingers burned for the chance of a big score, while auctioneer Sean Kelly keeps a watchful eye

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers focus on British sheep, which have provided the nation with milk, meat and wool for thousands of years. They rustle up a hogget and barley stew, lamb chops with kidneys, and North African dish mechoui lamb, and explore the history of the hardy breed found on North Ronaldsay in the Orkney Islands

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers revisit the 1970s, a decade which is all too often unfairly stigmatised for its food. They show how a well-prepared chicken cordon bleu and banoffee pie can be a contemporary gastronomic delight, before heading to a restaurant whose menu harks back to that era

programme.title: Speed with Guy Martin
programme.sub-title: Speed with Guy Martin: F1 Challenge
programme.desc: The motorcycle racer joins a pit crew during the 2017 Belgian Grand Prix, providing behind the scenes insight into the world of Formula One. Guy has to work on the split second timing that allows a team to change four tyres in 1.92 seconds, with each individual mechanic as many as 34 different actions without getting in each others way, and also takes on the most dangerous job on the crew - stepping in front of speeding vehicles to remove tyres as soon as they stop

programme.title: The Americas with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon travels across Central America, from the Caribbean to the Pacific. Along the way, he goes diving on a coral reef on the coast of Belize, and witnesses a gun battle between park rangers and intruders in Chiquibul National Park. He also discovers how climate change has left Guatemala devastated by famine and drought, reports on measures to curb gang violence in El Salvador, and learns how Costa Rica aims to become the worlds first carbon neutral country by 2021

programme.title: Special Ops: To Catch a Criminal
programme.desc: The Serious Fraud Office go undercover to investigate a suspect holiday home company offering exclusive residences in the Caribbean

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul Whitehouse and Bob Mortimer head to Mid-Wales as the embark on another series of angling trips round the UK, fishing for chub in the Irfon and Wye rivers. The friends also meet David Lyons, the founder of charity Tackling Minds, which helps people with depression, anxiety or are recovering from addiction to get out to rivers and lakes to fish

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul Whitehouse and Bob Mortimer head to a secluded pike lake in Dumfries and Galloway, staying overnight at Spedlins Castle, which is reputed to be haunted. Their second fishing location at Kinmount House has a more refined feel and the boys quickly settle in to fish, discussing how Bobs life has changed since his Gone Fishing journey started so many years ago and the many beautiful places they have seen and fished

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan hosts an extended episode of the current affairs quiz, with Ian Hislop and Paul Merton joined by Ed Davey MP and Rachel Parris

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts an extended edition of the comedy panel game, with Ria Lina, Eshaan Akbar and Jimmy Carr joining regular Alan Davies to answer questions on the theme of tricks and treats

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: James Acaster, Rob Beckett, Ed Gamble, Sara Pascoe and John Robins join host Dara O Briain and regular participant Hugh Dennis for the topical comedy show, looking back at the events of October 2016 through the medium of fast-thinking and improvisation

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Host Dara O Briain and regular contributor Hugh Dennis present a special edition of the topical comedy show featuring the best of series 15 as well as out-takes from it

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: In this special festive edition of the award-winning show, Tom Allen plays host in front of a packed audience and welcomes Thanyia Moore and Lloyd Griffith to the stage

programme.title: Schitts Creek
programme.desc: Patrick attempts to take David on a romantic hike, while Johnny suffers a health scare that sends everybody into panic mode

programme.title: Schitts Creek
programme.desc: Stevie is nowhere to be found on opening night for Cabaret, while David attempts to make a big announcement

programme.title: Schitts Creek
programme.desc: David scouts a potential wedding venue, while Johnny and Moira have a romantic picnic by the creek

programme.title: Schitts Creek
programme.desc: David is embarrassed by a childhood issue that resurfaces, while Johnny, Stevie and Roland attend a viewing for a motel nearby

programme.title: Judge Romesh
programme.desc: Two friends fight over money and girls, and a sister brings her brother to court after his meddling in her love life led to public humiliation

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. Police in Western Australia arrest three young men after a car chase through suburban Perth, and a drunk man tries to get into his car in New South Wales.

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. Water Police in New South Wales are called to a yacht in trouble in Sydney Harbour, and Victoria officers execute a search warrant on a house.

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. A Victoria operation targets the large-scale cannabis cultivation activities of a number of Vietnamese immigrants in the suburbs of Melbourne.

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line
programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. Australian police search for two men wanted in relation to a robbery and move in on a suspected drug dealers house in the hope of finding evidence.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: The trawlers Fruitful Bough and Rosebloom, crewed by two sets of brothers, find themselves not only working for each other, but also competing for catches. One trawler has its net completely ripped away by a massive swell, but it is also richly rewarded by huge hauls of prawns

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Crabbing off the Outer Hebrides is hindered by December gales - the worst weather encountered in four years of the series. Father and son Charlie and Charles McBride owe thousands of pounds for illegally landing fish beyond their quota, with a spell in prison looming if they are not able to settle these debts

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Bob Mortimer, Kimberly Wyatt, Ross Noble and Jimi Mistry are among the celebrities hoping to raise money for charity as Sean Kelly opens more mystery storage containers. The host also welcomes Shaun Ryder and Bez, Jenny Eclair and Lizzie Roper, along with Jimmy Bullard and Carl Froch

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Dan gambles on a lot he might later regret in when the gang visits Milton Keynes, while Nat lets her heart rule her head on a sale

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: The fortune-finding show continues in Bentwaters, with the contents of some old army bunkers exciting the bidders, while a vintage box captures Ruperts attention

programme.title: Outback Pilots
programme.desc: Documentary outlining the work of pilots who risk their lives every day flying through Australias inhospitable Outback terrain. Crop-dusting ace Dennis faces extreme low-level flying in a race to complete the biggest job of the year, while Trevor and his rookie aviators prepare to save tourists in a fierce storm

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May build their own stretch limousines out of other vehicles and use them to transport celebrities to the Brit Awards. Meanwhile, a Ford Mustang is put through its paces, and actress Billie Piper is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May take three lightweight supercars across Europe in search of the continents best roads, and Jeremy looks at Volkswagens decision to put a Bentley engine in the Golf. Helen Mirren is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Rick Steins Far Eastern Odyssey
programme.desc: The chef ends his exploration of the Far Easts most diverse food cultures by visiting Bangladesh, sampling the curry on offer in the country that has played a major role in establishing the success of Indian restaurants throughout the UK

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers continue their culinary journey through time as they celebrate British food. There is nothing like a hearty breakfast to start the day, but this vital morning meal has continued to change and evolve through time

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Clare Balding, Asim Chaudhry, Victoria Coren Mitchell and Greg James join host Rob Brydon and regular captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show. As ever, the participants aim to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible lies about themselves in a bid to secure a team victory

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Marcus Brigstocke, Anna Richardson, Tom Rosenthal and Sindhu Vee go toe-to-toe testing their general knowledge skills in a variety of trivia-based games across the week

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Ronni Ancona, Nathan Caton, Colin Murray and Sally Phillips go toe-to-toe testing their general knowledge skills in a variety of trivia-based games across the week

programme.title: Have I Got a Bit More News for You
programme.desc: Actor David Tennant hosts an extended edition of the satirical quiz, with comedian Jack Dee and journalist Helen Lewis joining team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton to look back at the weeks events

programme.title: QI XL
programme.desc: Liza Tarbuck, Phill Jupitus and Sean Lock join regular panellist Alan Davies to answer questions on the subject of games, with points awarded for the answers host Stephen Fry finds most interesting

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson are joined by comedians Romesh Ranganathan and David ODoherty, singer Melanie C and actress Charlotte Ritchie to discuss and dissect the events that have set the British publics chins wagging. Jimmy Carr hosts the irreverent panel show

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Dara O Briain returns with a timely new run of the topical comedy show, with Angela Barnes, Ed Gamble, James Acaster, Milton Jones and Tez Ilyas joining regular panellist Hugh Dennis to take a comic look at whats been happening in the news through stand-up and improvised games

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.sub-title: Would I Lie to You? The Unseen Bits
programme.desc: A compilation of extra material from the comedy panel show, hosted by Rob Brydon. Team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack are joined by guests including Claudia Winkleman, Miles Jupp, Bob Mortimer, Jo Brand, Adil Ray, Kirsty Wark, Amanda Abbington and Carol Vorderman to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible lies about themselves

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?

programme.title: Survivor South Africa
programme.desc: With a format like this, who says there cant be trouble in paradise? Katinka get their hands on immunity, and Werner makes the decision to start voicing his opinions within his alliance.

programme.title: Survivor South Africa
programme.desc: More scheming and sun-kissed scenery from this version of the hit format. The women begin to put some distance between themselves and Toni as her emotional backlash gets to Katinka.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A witness gives Ben and Nate a lead after their patrol car is hit by a stray bullet, but no evidence can be found to identify the owner of a vehicle seen speeding from the scene. The investigation takes a sudden turn when forensics discover two bullet casings outside the home of their eyewitness. Meanwhile, morale is at a low ebb at Sun Hill over the lack of support offered to Callum over the recent accusations of assault

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jo and her team are summoned to the scene of a road traffic accident in which a teenager was hit by a car, but has since fled the scene. Instead, they end up dealing with another youngster found fatally wounded in a nearby park. Drugs are found under the crash vehicle, and a witness confirms the two youths were seen together in the park, but Max gets impatient as Jos investigation begins to flounder and Commander Kennedy has to rally the disheartened detectives

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part two of two. Morale within the team picks up as the hunt for Paul Sorrels killer begins to make progress. The dead youngsters cousin reveals the lad was - uncharacteristically - involved in a drug deal to help his mother make ends meet, but the prime suspects are released because of a lack of evidence. Mickey is furious when Neil allows Max to approach his informant, knowing it could put her in danger

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Suspicion falls on the father of a four-year-old boy who goes missing from his garden, but CCTV footage of the abduction tells a different story. Callum, visiting Sun Hill to discuss his suspension, follows the unfolding case and cannot resist chipping in with his opinion of the suspect, but it is solid work by his colleagues in the uniform branch that finally tracks the missing child to a storm drain beside the Thames, where rapidly rising water puts several lives in danger. Joel Beckett guest stars

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jack directs an operation to keep rival football fans apart, but ends up unwittingly channelling a group of them into a dangerous situation. As tension mounts, Commander Lisa Kennedy becomes increasingly anxious about her son, who is attending the match, and she takes control when an ambulance is needed to reach a woman suffering an asthma attack in the crowd. In the ensuing clean-up, a body is discovered

programme.title: Home Fires
programme.desc: Drama about the lives of a group of Womens Institute members in a rural Cheshire community during the Second World War. In the face of an impending conflict with Germany, the Great Paxford WI faces a difficult decision. When president Joyce Cameron resigns, taking most of the membership with her, Frances Barden and her supporters must recruit new helpers from unexpected places. Starring Samantha Bond, Francesca Annis, Ruth Gemmell, Claire Rushbrook and Frances Grey, with Ed Stoppard and Mark Bazeley

programme.title: Home Fires
programme.desc: As Frances and Joyce battle for leadership of the new group, the others face problems of a much more personal nature. Erica and Wills relationship is tested after his cancer diagnosis, Pat is struggling with her unhappy marriage and Miriam has one last chance to stop David enlisting. Newcomer Teresa Fenchurch gets off to a bad start, but her mishap brings a dashing RAF officer to the village. Francesca Annis and Samantha Bond star, with Frances Grey, Ed Stoppard, Claire Rushbrook and Leanne Best

programme.title: Home Fires
programme.desc: The impact of the war begins to be felt in Great Paxford as the women are forced to make sacrifices for the salvage effort. But soon matters on the personal front replace their efforts on the home front as Kate and Jacks relationship intensifies, Pats marriage deteriorates and Claire finally plucks up the courage to ask Spencer out - unaware he is hiding a secret that could ruin their relationship before it has even started. Meanwhile, Alison resorts to desperate measures to pay a bill, and soon realises her actions will cost her much more. Wartime drama, with Claire Rushbrook, Daisy Badger, Rachel Hurd-Wood and Fenella Woolgar

programme.title: Catherine Cooksons The Man Who Cried
programme.desc: Feature-length period drama about Abel Mason, an ordinary working man whose extramarital affair leads to murder, and prompts him to hit the road with his son in search of a new life. The pair head north and Abel eventually finds employment with a wealthy garage owner. Ciaran Hinds and Kate Buffery star

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Everyone is looking forward to Trixie and Matthews wedding and a bonny baby competition brings the community together. Its not all good news, however, as the team learn about a pregnant woman and her family living in a cramped caravan, while a worrying disease outbreak directly impacts the residents of Nonnatus House

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: Supermodel sensation Birdie reluctantly returns to her roots in Great Slaughter at the insistence of her money-obsessed manager, Max Savage. When he is found dead in a locked room, Sister Boniface and the team are called in to investigate

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.sub-title: And Then I Fell in Love
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Nikki sees a barefoot girl being knocked over by a car, marking the beginning of a case that takes the team into the harrowing world of sex grooming and teenage prostitution. The police know the girl has been abused and suspicion soon falls on her stepfather. Meanwhile, an early-morning bath saves Harrys life, and two puzzling corpses are brought in to the centre - a heavily tattooed man and a decomposed body found at the airport. Guest starring Sanjeev Bhaskar, Elyes Gabel and Madeline Duggan

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: The penultimate episode sees the retired detectives investigating possibly their most difficult cold case yet. A bloodstained bust is uncovered during construction work in a cemetery and the evidence points to the murder of an alternative-medicine practitioner seven years earlier. Further clues lead to the controversial world of cryopreservation - the practice of keeping clinically dead patients frozen to extend their life cycle. Sasha is determined they dont put a foot wrong - but with the sobering possibility that two perpetrators are still at large, the detectives are forced to go out on a limb

programme.title: The Last Detective
programme.desc: Comedy drama series from A Touch of Frost writer Richard Harris. Detective Constable Dangerous Davies is an obstinate traditionalist used to being given bottom-of-the-pile jobs at his north London station until a routine inquiry offers him a lead in a 20-year-old unsolved murder case. Enlisting the help of his eccentric drinking buddy Mod Lewis, the mild-mannered detective sets out to prove himself to his colleagues. Peter Davison and Sean Hughes star

programme.title: Hamish Macbeth
programme.desc: Lochdubhs community prepares for the annual shinty match, but Hamish suspects foul play. Comedy drama, starring Robert Carlyle

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Edmond reveals to Villefort that Heloise stole the vial of poison from him - the same poison used to murder the Marquise.

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: Romance blossoms between Lieutenant Kate Butler and an officer from another unit. Meanwhile, Glory is not on the cards for Luke Roberts

programme.title: Doctors
programme.desc: Ronnie confesses the truth to George, and the doctors help a man contact his estranged daughter when he discovers he is a carrier of a rare genetic illness

programme.title: Doctors
programme.desc: A vulnerable woman longing for company allows an unsavoury teenager into her home. Ronnie discovers someone unexpected may be connected to Squires

programme.title: Holby City
programme.desc: The truth is revealed about Keris rape allegation and friendships are put to the test when Liam asks Danny to retract his evidence. Meanwhile, a manic depressive annoys Anton. Hospital drama, guest starring Tony Booth

programme.title: Casualty
programme.desc: Ruth lies in a coma following her attempted suicide, while the staff tries to come to terms with what has happened and Harry reflects on what could have been done differently. He finds Ruths diary and reads back over her months in the emergency department, discovering some terrible truths

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part two of two. Commander Kennedy prepares to face a hostile media over charges that police handling of the football crowd contributed to the murder, and is shocked to see CCTV footage showing her own son running away from the crime scene. The victim turns out to have a complicated love life that may have led to the killing, and two other suspects are identified, but the commanders leadership and probity face their sternest test

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Sean discovers the secret that will change his life forever. At the Beales, the gang has a laugh at vest-wearing Christian

programme.title: Classic EastEnders
programme.desc: Roxy faces every mothers worst nightmare, while Dots family grows in a very unexpected way. Suzy leaves the Square for good, but not as she had planned

programme.title: Soldier, Soldier
programme.desc: Rumours start to circulate about Colonel Hammonds love life, and the fusiliers suspect his loyalties will be compromised by his new love

programme.title: Monarch of the Glen
programme.desc: Archies wayward sister Lizzie turns up with her New Age guru boyfriend Gerald, and tries to convert Glenbogle into a healing centre. Katrina is furious that the well in her garden has dried up, and gamekeeper Golly loses his knack of wooing the opposite sex. Richard Briers and Susan Hampshire star

programme.title: Londons Burning
programme.desc: A window cleaner gets his arm trapped in a cradle mechanism at the top of a tower block, and Sicknote is sent over the edge to rescue him

programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Resistance leader Michelle blackmails Von Strohm and Gruber for 10 million francs, after revealing she has a photograph of the pair holding the Fallen Madonna, while Herr Flick gives Helga a truth drug to discover the location of the painting

programme.title: Waiting for God
programme.desc: Marions intimate knowledge of pharmacology exposes Harveys bogus illness. Comedy, starring Stephanie Cole

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: The arrival of Cleggs cousin threatens to spell the end of the gangs gentle walks, so they resolve to get rid of him. Aubrey finds he can still beat Billy and Alvin cycling up hills, but discovers his own weakness. Starring Peter Sallis

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Has Anyone Seen Barrys Midlife Crisis?
programme.desc: Trulys plans to rescue Howard from his bedroom are given a boost when Auntie Wainwright puts some lightweight scaffolding up for sale - ideal for springing someone imprisoned on an upper floor. Long-running comedy series, starring Frank Thornton and Robert Fyfe

programme.title: The Brokenwood Mysteries
programme.desc: Christmas in Brokenwood takes a dark turn when a man dressed as Santa is found dead by the roadside - electrocuted in a most unusual way

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: Russian sleeper agents plan to detonate a nuclear bomb in London, leaving the team with no alternative but to kidnap the mole and force her to help prevent the attack. Under interrogation she reveals that vital information is contained in a dossier hidden at London Bridge - but as Section D members race to retrieve it, they are met by a hail of gunfire

programme.title: Lovejoy
programme.desc: Two mysterious murders appear to be the work of an ancient Mayan curse attached to a statue acquired by Lovejoy. Drama, starring Ian McShane and Phyllis Logan

programme.desc: Part two of two. The friends search for the evidence that will prove Alices innocence and save her from the gallows. Documents found at Lizzies flat, inside information from the police and Alices knowledge of Richards background begin to point to a high-level military conspiracy, centred on Porton Down. Starring Anna Maxwell Martin and Rachael Stirling

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy cannot believe his ears when Rodney tells him he has found a girlfriend. The trouble is, the woman is old enough to be his mother - and to make matters worse, her husband is about to be released from prison

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: After a taste of the high life, Del-Boy and Rodney are back in Nelson Mandela House and back in business as Trotters Independent Traders. When they receive an invitation to a cross-Channel Navy reunion intended for dear-departed Uncle Albert, Del spies the opportunity to make a few quid on a booze cruise. The only problem is, Rodney is now the companys managing director and would never approve. David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst, John Challis and Tessa Peake-Jones star in the 2002 Christmas special

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotter brothers are guests at a wedding, where they are intrigued to hear their dear departed mother inherited the ill-gotten gains of an East End bank robber - but nobody has ever found the loot. Christmas special of the long-running comedy, originally shown in 1987, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield, with a guest appearance by Joan Sims

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del buys a new manual to help him show Raquel more appreciation and give him the confidence to make positive decisions. Unfortunately, as a result of such upbeat thinking, the Trotters cash flow hits an all-time low and an angry punter is left baying for blood. The second part of the Christmas 1996 trilogy, starring David Jason, Tessa Peake-Jones and Nicholas Lyndhurst

Instead the hotelier keeps being caught in compromising situations with a young Australian woman, and a visiting psychiatrist finds his increasingly manic behaviour both fascinating and alarming. Classic comedy first broadcast in 1979, starring John Cleese and Prunella Scales

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: In a bid to impress Lucy, Lee prepares for a 10km fun run, only to injure himself at the start of his training. The aspiring athlete tries to hide the mishap from his flatmate and gets a secret sports massage, which inevitably leads to more trouble. Comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton

programme.title: Bottom
programme.desc: The boys join Mrs Linekers Love Bureau hoping to find their perfect love matches. Richies video tells the potential suitors that he is, in fact, a duke and this secures him a date with a countess from Moldavia. Undeterred, he invites her to his place and arranges for Eddie to pretend to be his butler for the evening. Chaotic comedy, written by and starring Adrian Edmondson and Rik Mayall

programme.title: Almas Not Normal
programme.desc: Theres some good news for Lin as the hospital staff inform her that her section could finally be lifted, although this is dependent on her either moving into a hostel or in with a family member. As Alma is finally getting her life back on track and the hostel isnt exactly the right place for a recovering addict, Alma has to convince her grandma to let Lin move in with her - but will this be a step too far for Lin and Joan?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the arcade-themed quiz in which contestants drop tokens down a choice of four chutes in the hope of winning a £10,000 jackpot.

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: The award-winning documentary series moves to Birmingham Womens Hospital. Twenty-five-year-old Samantha and her partner Tony, who struggled for years to conceive, return to the ward after losing their first child at 25 weeks. However, Samanthas medical history means the birth is not without challenges. Meanwhile, 33-year-old Sharon and 44-year-old Rav come to the hospital expecting their second child together, and Rhiana and her partner Lee hope for another textbook water birth for the arrival of their second son

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Parents-to-be include 29-year-old Ben, who has been experiencing sympathy pains and cravings, and thinks he needs to man-up for his partner Amy. Ambitious young doctors Nikoletta and Andreas were concentrating on their careers when a chance meeting evolved into a whirlwind, long-distance romance, and Andreas is determined to be at Nikolettas side as a father and not as a doctor, putting his medical training to one side

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Ashley, whos 35, is determined to right the wrongs he faced in his own childhood with a family of his own. He and his 30-year-old partner Gemma are expecting their fourth child together. Meanwhile, 41-year-old Sunny and 32-year-old Shay, who met on the set of a Bollywood film, arrive in the ward expecting their first child

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Beth and David, who met online on a Harry Potter website, arrive in the hospital awaiting the birth of their baby daughter. Meanwhile, 28-year-old Kathereen from Colombia and Birmingham-born Nick, whos 40, are in the maternity ward expecting their second child together, and couple Gavin and Carla arrive for the birth of their baby son

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Sharnee, whos 25, and 27-year-old Dan await the arrival of their first child together. Meanwhile, after seven years trying and two failed rounds of IVF, 33-year-old Jo and 47-year-old Pat arrive on the ward to be induced, and April, whos 27, is having her third baby, with support from her little sister Chloe

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Chantell, whos 34, and 33-year-old Phil arrive in the hospital awaiting the birth of their third child together. Chantell had a troubled upbringing and never thought she would find love or have a family of her own, but when she met Phil, everything changed. Meanwhile, young couple Emily and Nathan, who still live at home, are determined to show the world that they can embrace the responsibilities of parenthood as they welcome their baby boy. Elsewhere, Clarke and Debbie, who have had a difficult pregnancy, arrive in the maternity ward

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Sarah, whos 40, and 29-year-old Tom, await the birth of their second child together. Sarah has a close relationship with her family, and hopes to have the same close bond with her daughter when she comes along. Meanwhile, couple Dawn and Scott arrive expecting baby number eight, and 27-year-old Jess and her partner Leon also arrive on the ward

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Paramedics need to get a sick baby to hospital. They also treat a man who suffers from epilepsy and an elderly lady who needs to take her medication

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Following crews from West Midlands Ambulance Service during the festive period. Laura and Anna are called to a man who has fallen off a roof, hitting his head on the way down

programme.title: Inside the Ambulance
programme.desc: Heavy snow in the West Midlands causes problems and two separate crews treat patients, both called John, who have both broken their hips after falling

programme.title: Inside the Operating Theatre
programme.desc: A four-year-old girl has her droopy eyelid lifted, a rugby player gets his broken nose reset and a woman has an operation on her wrist after almost a year of agony

programme.title: Inside the Operating Theatre
programme.desc: Nick has an ultrasound taken from inside his body to find out if he needs open-heart surgery, and Irene has gel removed from her eye to make her see again

programme.title: Nurses on the Ward
programme.desc: Renal nurse Neil treats a 19-year-old whose kidney transplant is failing, and on the surgical ward, Kat cares for a man recovering from a bowel cancer operation

programme.title: Nurses on the Ward
programme.desc: One of Advanced Nurse Practitioner Carolines patients is deteriorating rapidly and she must make a very difficult call to his wife to explain the perilous situation

programme.title: Interior Design Masters with Alan Carr
programme.desc: Michelle Ogundehin splits the contestants into three teams, each of which is given an open-plan office space to transform for a technology client, a sustainable beauty brand and a media team. The brief is to create a work space, a break-out space and a meeting space within the office, and Michelle will be looking for both displays of signature style and work that suits the needs of the client

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Alan takes charge designing the first bedroom, but doubt soon sets in as Amanda and Scott struggle to get on board with his artistic vision. To nail his rustic chic look, Alan visits interior designer Marie at her 300-year-old palazzo and ropes in Amanda to help source vintage gems at Palermos famous flea market. Later, Amanda surprises Alan with a birthday boat trip along Sicilys stunning Zingaro coast

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: The documentary follows two couples on a busy maternity ward in Leeds. Father-to-be William, who met his wife Belem online, shoots a video with a running commentary in Spanish for his family in Colombia, while Kerry has set aside 84 colour co-ordinated outfits for their new addition, explaining that if she isnt fully prepared for something she panics. However, when her babys heart rate drops in labour, its her partner Dan who starts to worry

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: New parents need to find a suburban home after having spent years renovating a property not suited to children

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Drew and Jonathan Scott help more couples renovate ramshackle properties, beginning as they help a pair find a charming fixer-upper to replace their tiny condo

programme.title: My Dream Home
programme.desc: Brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott come to the aid of busy parents Dorothy and John, who are racing to find a home of their own
